about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Our hotel serving in the captivating atmosphere of Mount Nemrut
about.heading: Where Nature and History Meet
about.description:
Güneş Motel is the closest hotel to Mount Nemrut, at a distance of 2 km. Located within the borders of Malatya, our motel is positioned at the point from which access to Mount Nemrut is the easiest and fastest. In this way, our guests can effortlessly experience Nemrut's unforgettable sunrise and sunset, admired by visitors from all over the world.

Since the 1980s, our hotel has been run by the same family; it is not just a place to stay, but an address of sincerity, trust, and warm hospitality. Thanks to this family-run culture passed down through generations, we have made it a tradition to make our guests feel at home.

From Güneş Motel, our guests can discover not only Mount Nemrut but also the valuable heritage of the Kingdom of Commagene, such as the Karakuş Tumulus, the Cendere Bridge, the Arsemia Ruins, Kahta Castle, and the ancient city of Perre.

As Güneş Motel, we aim to offer our guests an unforgettable experience in this land where history, nature, and culture intertwine. We invite you to feel both the sincere hospitality of Anatolia and the enchanting atmosphere of Nemrut together.
